Question.Subject: Bleudame.com - safe and legit, or a scam?
Question.Content:
I'm going to order some sunglasses from wwww.bleudame.com but the prices seem to be a little too good to be true.
Has anyone used their services before? Don't want to enter my card details into a dodgy website.
Thanks.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
well as the saying goes if it looks to good to be true, its usally is. well the details about the hosting was made on nov '07 so being going awhile OrgName: Liquid Web, Inc. OrgID: LQWB Address: 4210 Creyts Rd. City: Lansing StateProv: MI PostalCode: 48917 Country: US the thing that worries me is Unable to Verify Site March 20, 2010 14:52 PM Unable to verify 67.227.131.60
Although the Web site you are visiting is operated by an active Authorize.Net merchant, their Verified Merchant Seal is currently not configured properly. Please contact the merchant directly to confirm the authenticity of this site. so it looks like the site doesnt care about that.. which i would consider very important to show they comply with security.
